A free-form based object that contains additional context about the error.

The destination to store/move the document to.
Document
Represents a document entity in the system.
Document_
 
DocumentCommonService
Service class for common document and document revision-related operations.
DocumentController
Controller handling /documents endpoints.
DocumentDTO
The representation of a document.
DocumentDTOMapper
The DocumentDTOMapper class is responsible for mapping Document entities to DocumentDTO DTOs.
DocumentFilterSpecification
The DocumentFilterSpecification class provides specifications for filtering Document entities.
DocumentManagerApplication
Main entry point for the Document Manager Application.
DocumentMapper
The DocumentMapper class provides mapping between field names in the Document and their corresponding fields in the Document_ entity.
DocumentMapper.Field
Enum defining the fields in the Document entity.
DocumentNotFoundException
Exception indicating that a document could not be found.
DocumentRepository
The DocumentRepository interface provides access to document-related data stored in the database.
DocumentRevision
Represents a document revision entity in the system.

DocumentRevisionController
Controller handling document /revisions endpoints.
DocumentRevisionDTO
The representation of a document revision.
DocumentRevisionDTOMapper
The DocumentRevisionDTOMapper class is responsible for mapping DocumentRevision entities to DocumentRevisionDTO DTOs.
DocumentRevisionRepository
The DocumentRevisionRepository interface provides access to document revision-related data stored in the database.
DocumentRevisionService
Service class responsible for managing document revisions.
DocumentsApi
 
DocumentService
Service class responsible for managing documents.
EmailAlreadyExistsException
Exception indicating that an email already exists in the system.
FileOperation
Enumeration representing different file operations and their associated error messages.
FileOperationException
Exception indicating an error occurred during a file operation.
FileValidator
The FileValidator class implements the validation logic for the ValidFile annotation.
FileWithPathAlreadyExistsException
Exception indicating that a file with a specific path already exists.
FilterPredicateGenerator
The FilterPredicateGenerator class generates JPA criteria predicates for filtering entities.
GlobalExceptionHandler
Global exception handler to handle exceptions across the application.
HashProperties
Configuration properties for hashing algorithm, defined in application.yaml.
HashService
Service class for generating hash values for files.
InvalidRegexInputException
Exception indicating that an invalid regular expression input was provided.
KeyException
Exception indicating an error related to cryptographic keys.
KeyManager
The KeyManager class provides utility methods for managing RSA keys.
KeyProperties
Configuration properties for keys, defined in application.yaml.
PageableDTO
Represents pagination and sorting information for querying a paginated dataset.
PageableDTOMapper
The PageableDTOMapper class is responsible for mapping Pageable objects to PageableDTO DTOs.
PageWithDocumentsDTO
Represents a page of documents, including pagination and sorting information.
PageWithDocumentsDTOMapper
The PageWithDocumentsDTOMapper class is responsible for mapping Page objects to PageWithDocumentsDTO DTOs.
PageWithRevisionsDTO
Represents a page of document revisions, including pagination and sorting information.
PageWithRevisionsDTOMapper
The PageWithRevisionsDTOMapper class is responsible for mapping Page objects to PageWithRevisionsDTO DTOs.
RevisionDeletionException
Exception indicating an error occurred while deleting a document revision.
RevisionFilterSpecification
The RevisionFilterSpecification class provides specifications for filtering DocumentRevision entities.
RevisionMapper
The RevisionMapper class provides mapping between field names in the DocumentRevision and their corresponding fields in the DocumentRevision_ entity.
RevisionMapper.Field
Enum defining the fields in the DocumentRevision entity.
RevisionNotFoundException
Exception indicating that a document revision could not be found.
